div.p: … I, …, produced the contract, and all that is written herein satisfies me as aforesaid. … I, Flavius Ioannes son of Iakobos … wrote on her behalf because she told me (since she did not know letters). (2nd hand) ‘I, Flavius Iakobos son of Papil— … (3nd hand) ‘I, Daniel son of Zacharias … (4th hand) ‘Through me, Paleides …
… 1 solidus by the standard of Apollonos. Translation: N. Gonis, P. Harris 3 302
